channel.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
channel.description:
[url='https://www.polygon.com/2013/12/9/5191332/report-cover-art-and-image-leak-from-next-alien-game']https://www.polygon.com/2013/12/9/5191332/report-cover-art-and-image-leak-from-next-alien-game[/url]
Looking closely at the reflection on the face shield of the helmet reveals the image of a xenomorph.
The article by Kotaku states that "Amanda Ripley mostly faces off against clones, soldiers and a single alien"... a single alien???... where's the fun in that? Alien: Colonial Marines was blasted for its lack of confrontations with aliens, amongst other numerous issues.

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Yeah, and the AI is just as stupid as every other game and you kill about 10,000 no-names by the time everything is done.

I’m thinking like the whole game has six, maybe seven people, each named, and voiced and given super advanced AI, right down to taking meal times, sleep schedules and most importantly, working together to hunt or escape from you, the Alien in an intelligent and world-interactive manner. The majority of development time would go towards AI, Dialog and making every bit of the limited size spacecraft interactive for the AI crew (and the alien of course).

Basically, I want a game based on “Alien” and not “Aliens”, from the alien’s perspective.

Oh god this sounds amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Bloodshot:

Gonna hold off excitement though to prevent disappointment, but still I don’t think you can go wrong with survival horror in the alien franchise.

Even Colonial Marines was pretty good and scary until the aliens actually showed up.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Yeah, don’t forget that A:CM was pretty visually spot on too. That being said, this IS a completely different company with a completely different goal.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Wow, I like the faithfulness to the first movie’s art direction.

Gonna hold off excitement though to prevent disappointment, but still I don’t think you can go wrong with survival horror in the alien franchise.

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Yeah, thinking about it now, it would make more sense for a Predator game or like you said, something new. The xenomorphs were never really that intelligent, they were just sneaky and deadly.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I’d love a game like that regardless of the branding. In fact, I think it if was set in the Alien universe it might be weaker than if it was its own thing.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
That would be interesting. I think it would also be interesting if the roles, strengths, weaknesses, personality, relationships, etc. were all randomly selected each game and had an impact on the game, so that you’d have to study the crew and learn about them to create situations where you can get them alone and hit em with your little mini-mouth. You’d also have to choose what order to eliminate them to affect how the game plays out later on. For instance, if you killed the person with the role of mechanic first, then the rest of the game, you could destroy systems and machinery and it wouldn’t get repaired, letting you turn off the lights or jam the airlocks, whereas if you kill a miner (I’m assuming you’d get maybe one or two kills in, depending on how you do them, before the crew catches on to what’s happening), the other miners stay out of the ship longer to finish their work, giving you less chances to kill them, but more time with less people in the ship. Or if you killed the person with the strong, leadership personality, then the rest of the crew would fall into disarray and might turn on each other, whereas if you kill a character that is well-liked by the crew, you might end up angering them instead of striking fear into them, making them harder to kill.

Man, I kinda want to play this game now.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Yeah, and the AI is just as stupid as every other game and you kill about 10,000 no-names by the time everything is done.

I’m thinking like the whole game has six, maybe seven people, each named, and voiced and given super advanced AI, right down to taking meal times, sleep schedules and most importantly, working together to hunt or escape from you, the Alien in an intelligent and world-interactive manner. The majority of development time would go towards AI, Dialog and making every bit of the limited size spacecraft interactive for the AI crew (and the alien of course).

Every AVP game has a campaign where you play as a xeno, but it’s always at the whim of the Queen.

Didn’t one of the alien vs predator games do something like that?

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
While we are wishing for things, I really want an Alien game, where you are the lone alien, and you have to kill as many of a ships crew before they escape or kill you. All development effort would go into making the crew AI as intelligent as possible and also thousands of lines of dialogue for a game that never, ever plays the same way twice.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
They could add a decent amount of combat while still using the alien for horror purposes. It might be pretty good.

Edit: horror, not borrow, fucking iPad keyboard with it’s damn autocorrect.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
From what I’ve heard, it has a bit of a Riddick Vibe with an emphasis on melee combat and stealth. This could be awesome. If that’s the case, I think a marine/ merc might actually be scarier than a xeno,

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
danielsangeo:

So, essentially, Amnesia: The Dark Descent but in space?

I guess. Never really played that game for longer than an hour to be honest.

I won’t say it’s because I’m a pussy but it’s because I’m a pussy.

Read full topic

Still the cover of this looks pretty cool to be honest.

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’d love to see a horror game where the main enemy is the environment itself and there are next to no monsters to fight.

Would be nice if this game was set in a derelict spaceship slowly falling apart with just a couple of xenos stalking Amanda.

Read full topic

item.title: New ALIEN Game Leaked Images
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I’d like to see fewer aliens but also none of that soldier shit either. Some psychological tense horror akin to Alien and not Aliens.

Read full topic
